summary: This is just a simple retexture of Asianboy345\'s Gildhorn Tera Armor for UNP. It changes the green parts to brown.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all, this is my first upload.

I just made this simple retexture of one of the Tera armors for myself and thought I\'d share in case anyone else wanted the same thing. All it does it changes the green parts of the Gildhorn armor to brown and tints the other areas slightly more grey/black.

[b]**Male Version is up**[/b] Images pending... Downloads are separate.

[b]Requires:[/b]
Asianboy\'s Tera Armors Collection: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846/
UNP Body: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/

Optional:
Tera Armors - Noisy Normals: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33437/
Adds a little more... texture to the texture :)


[b]To use:[/b]

Back up your original textures: 
Go to Data > Textures > Teraarmors2 > Highelfl19 > Copy Highelf_F_L19_Body_diff.dds and Highelf_F_L19_Hand_diff.dds to a safe place.

To use my retexture:
Download the mod.
Drop the textures folder in your Skyrim Data folder  (Program Files > Steam > steamapps > common > Skyrim) and click \"yes\" to overwrite and replace the default textures.


[b]My model uses:[/b]
Real Girls Textures: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36425/
The Eyes of Beauty: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/
Better Freckles: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4502/
Detailed Lips: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/689/
Ponytail Hairs: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31797/
author: Eyrika
